author: dlr
msg: On the merge-tracking branch: Refactor merge info database connection
opening activities into a single routine.
This prepares us for the use of sqlite's "user_version" PRAGMA with
which to version our schema.
* subversion/libsvn_fs_util/merge-info-sqlite-index.c
(path_mergeinfo_db): Remove.
(open_db): ...replacing with a new routine which both calculates the
path and opens the connection.
(svn_fs_merge_info__create_index, svn_fs_merge_info__update_index,
svn_fs_merge_info__get_merge_info): Use open_db() to acquire a
database connection.

author: dlr
msg: On the merge-tracking branch: Squelch compiler warning from gcc 4.1.0.
* subversion/libsvn_fs_util/merge-info-sqlite-index.c
(get_merge_info_for_path): Cast "" to char * to avoid warning about
discarding const.

msg: Remove branch, backported to the 1.4.x line in r22872.

author: dlr
